channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Very broken up and uneven pathing slabs, 13th January
item.description:
Very broken up and uneven pathing slabs. Outside 25 Thaxted Road. These have a lots moment and some sticking up. Causing a very bad trip hazard and an accident waiting to happen.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thaxted Road, New Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not emptied, 13th January
item.description:
The binary have been missed and not emptied when it should of been done on the 10th January, the bins are where they are usually collected from so don't understand how anx why they are missed but now there is a bad smell and foxes attacking the bins

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marlow Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Dead Wood Pigeon, 13th January
item.description:
I have placed the dead bird in two sealed black bags. From 6.30am tomorrow (Wednesday 14th January) it will be left at the end of our driveway adjacent to the pavement. (158 Goodhart Way). Thank you for arranging collection.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 156, Goodhart Way, Park Langley, Greater London

item.title: Flooding outside numbers 35-41 Ridgeview Road, 13th January
item.description:
Combination of a dip in the road and the drains being blocked has caused flooding outside 35, 37, 39 and 41 Ridgeview Road, N20 0HH. This is a long-standing problem and every time there is moderately heavy rain, it floods from about half way up the driveways to the middle of the road, blocking the pavement completely. This can be dangerous as there are 2 schools in very close proximity and the children and young people frequently go out on the road to go around the flooded area. Not ideal given the speed that many drivers come down the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49, Ridgeview Road, Whetstone, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lucey Way, Bermondsey, Greater London
